brandName.$description: Figma only. Usage: link brand name props in components to Variants, e.g., media-fixed placeholder.

modeName.$description: Figma only. Usage: link breakpoint props in component to breakpoint name, e.g., template.

brandLogos.$description: Figma only. Usage: link breakpoint props in component to breakpoint name, e.g., template.

loyalty-container-low.$description: Subtle loyalty container. Usage: Low-emphasis loyalty UI elements.

loyalty-container-hi.$description: Prominent loyalty container. Usage: High-emphasis loyalty UI elements.

on-loyalty-container-low.$description: Text on subtle loyalty container. Usage: content on low-emphasis loyalty elements.

on-loyalty-container-hi.$description: Text on prominent loyalty container. Usage: content on high-emphasis loyalty elements.

loyalty.$description: Loyalty program color. Usage: Member-exclusive features and benefits.

on-loyalty.$description: Text on loyalty elements. Usage: content on primary loyalty elements.

outline-loyalty.$description: Outline loyalty program color. Usage: Member-exclusive features and benefits.

primary-container-low.$description: Low-emphasis primary container. Usage: Subtle container with brand color influence.

primary-container-hi.$description: High-emphasis primary container. Usage: Prominent container with brand color influence.

primary.$description: Primary action color. Buttons, key UI elements.

on-primary.$description: Text on primary color, e.g., content on primary buttons.

outline-primary-hi.$description: High-emphasis primary outline. Usage: strong primary element borders

outline-primary-low.$description: Low-emphasis primary outline. Usage: Subtle primary element borders

secondary-container.$description: Secondary container surface. Usage: Alternative container backgrounds.

on-secondary-container.$description: Text on secondary containers. Usage: Text and icons on secondary containers.

outline-secondary.$description: Secondary outline. Usage: borders for secondary elements.

accent-container-low.$description: Subtle accent container. Usage: Low-emphasis accent UI elements.

accent-container-hi.$description: High-emphasis accent container. Usage: Prominent accent UI elements.

on-accent-container.$description: Text on accent container. Usage: content on accent containers.

accent.$description: Accent color. Usage: secondary interactive elements.

on-accent.$description: Text on accent color. Usage: Content on accent elements.

outline-accent.$description: Accent color. Usage: secondary interactive elements.

surface-container-low.$description: Low-emphasis container surface. Usage: subtle container backgrounds.

surface-container-mid.$description: Medium-emphasis container surface. Usage: standard container backgrounds.

surface-container-hi.$description: High-emphasis container surface. Usage: prominent container backgrounds.

on-surface-low.$description: Low-emphasis surface content. Usage: Subtle text, secondary information.

on-surface-mid.$description: Medium-emphasis surface content. Usage: standard text content.

on-surface-hi.$description: High-emphasis surface content. Usage: Important text, headings.

neutral-container.$description: Neutral container background. Usage: contrasting background in current theme.

on-neutral-container.$description: Text on neutral container background. Usage: content on neutral container.

danger-container-low.$description: Low-emphasis danger container. Usage: subtle error indicators.

danger-container-hi.$description: High-emphasis danger container. Usage: prominent error indicators.

on-danger-container-low.$description: Text on subtle danger container. Usage: content on subtle error elements.

on-danger-container-hi.$description: Text on prominent danger container. Usage: content on prominent error elements.

danger.$description: Danger color. Usage: error states, destructive actions.

on-danger.$description: Text on danger color. Usage: content on error elements.

outline-danger.$description: Outline danger color. Usage: error states, destructive actions.

warning-container-low.$description: Low-emphasis warning container. Usage: subtle warning indicators.

warning-container-hi.$description: High-emphasis warning container. Usage: prominent warning indicators.

warning.$description: Warning color. Usage: cautionary states, alerts.

outline-warning.$description: Outline warning color. Usage: cautionary states, alerts.

success-container-low.$description: Low-emphasis success container. Usage: subtle success indicators.

success-container-hi.$description: High-emphasis success container. Usage: prominent success indicators.

on-success-container-low.$description: content on subtle success container. Usage: content on subtle success elements

on-success-container-hi.$description: Content on priminent success container. Usage: content on prominentsuccess elements

success.$description: Success color. Usage: positive actions, completion states.

outline-success.$description: Success outline color. Usage: positive actions, completion states.

offer-container-low.$description: Low-emphasis offer container. Usage: subtle promotional content.

offer-container-hi.$description: High-emphasis offer container. Usage: prominent promotional content.

offer.$description: Offer color. Usage: special promotions, deals.

outline-offer.$description: Outline offer color. Usage: special promotions, deals.

eco-container-low.$description: Low-emphasis eco container. Usage: subtle sustainability indicators.

eco-container-hi.$description: High-emphasis eco container. Usage: prominent sustainability indicators.

family-container-low.$description: Low-emphasis family friendly container. Usage: subtle family indicators.

family-container-hi.$description: High-emphasis family container. Usage: prominent family indicators.

outline-family.$description: Family friendly outline. Usage: borders for family friendly elements.

link.$description: Link color. Usage: hyperlinks, interactive text.

watermark.$description: Subtle watermark color. Usage: heading-section-primary Watermark.

overlay-low.$description: Low-opacity overlay. Usage: subtle dimming overlays (30%).

overlay-mid.$description: Medium-opacity overlay. Usage: standard dimming overlays (54%).

overlay-hi.$description: High-opacity overlay. Usage: strong dimming overlays (70%).

shadow-default.$description: Standard shadow color. Usage: default shadow with medium opacity.

shadow-strong.$description: High-contrast shadow. Usage: more prominent shadow for higher elevation.

gradient-primary-hi-start.$description: High-emphasis primary gradient start. Usage: starting color for strong brand gradients.

gradient-primary-hi-end.$description: High-emphasis primary gradient end. Usage: high-emphasis primary gradient end.

gradient-primary-low-start.$description: High-emphasis primary gradient end. Usage: Starting color for subtle brand gradients.

gradient-primary-low-end.$description: Low-emphasis primary gradient end. Usage: ending color for subtle brand gradients.

gradient-secondary-start.$description: Secondary gradient start. Usage: starting color for secondary gradients.

gradient-secondary-end.$description: Secondary gradient end. Usage: ending color for secondary gradients.

gradient-white-min.$description: Minimum white opacity. Usage: starting point for white fade gradients (transparent).

gradient-white-max.$description: Maximum white opacity. Usage: ending point for white fade gradients (solid white).

gradient-black-min.$description: Minimum black opacity. Usage: starting point for black fade gradients (transparent).

gradient-black-mid.$description: Mid-point for black fade gradients (semi-transparent). Usage: mid-point for black fade gradients (semi-transparent).

gradient-black-hi.$description: High black opacity. Usage: strong point for black fade gradients (mostly opaque).

gradient-black-max.$description: Maximum black opacity. Usage: ending point for black fade gradients (solid black).

focus.$description: Outline for focused elements. Usage: keyboard focus states.

primary.$description: Primary hover state. Usage: hover effect for primary elements.

secondary-container.$description: Secondary container hover. Usage: hover effect for secondary containers.

accent.$description: Accent hover state. Usage: hover effect for accent elements.

transparent.$description: Transparent hover. Usage: subtle hover effect with transparency.

surface-container-mid.$description: Mid container hover. Usage: hover effect for standard containers.

surface-container-hi.$description: High container hover. Usage: hover effect for prominent containers.

outline-hi.$description: Outline hover. Usage: hover effect for borders.

neutral-container.$description: Neutral container hover. Usage: hover effect for neutral container elements.

danger.$description: Danger hover effect. Usage: hover state for error/warning elements.

offer.$description: Offer hover effect. Usage: hover state for promotional elements.

eco.$description: Eco hover effect. Usage: hover state for sustainability elements.

link.$description: Link hover effect. Usage: hover state for hyperlinks and text links.

classic.$description: Classic tier hover. Usage: hover state for classic membership elements;

gold.$description: Gold tier hover. Usage: hover state for gold membership elements.

primary.$description: Primary pressed effect. Usage: active state for primary buttons and key interactive elements.

secondary-container.$description: Secondary container pressed. Usage: active state for secondary containers and UI elements.

accent.$description: Accent pressed effect. Usage: active state for accent-colored interactive elements.

transparent.$description: Transparent pressed effect. Usage: subtle active state with transparency for ghost elements.

surface-container-low.$description: Low container pressed. Usage: active state for subtle container elements.

surface-container-mid.$description: Mid container pressed. Usage: active state for standard container elements.

surface-container-hi.$description: High container pressed. Usage: active state for prominent container elements.

danger.$description: Danger pressed effect. Usage: active state for error/warning elements.

offer.$description: Offer pressed effect. Usage: active state for promotional elements.

eco.$description: Eco pressed effect. Usage: active state for sustainability elements.

link.$description: Link pressed effect. Usage:  active state for hyperlinks and text links.

classic.$description: Classic tier pressed state. Active state for classic membership elements.

silver.$description: Silver tier pressed state. Usage: silver tier pressed state

gold.$description: Gold tier pressed state. Usage: active state for gold membership elements.

platinum.$description: Platinum tier pressed state. Usage: active state for platinum membership elements.

diamond.$description: Diamond tier pressed state.  Usage: active state for diamond membership elements.

limitless.$description: Limitless tier pressed state. Usage: limitless tier pressed state.

all-primary.$description: ALL's primary color, fixed between brands' themes. Usage: mostly used for ALL logos and any element that needs to show ALL's primary color with no variation when a brand's theme is applied.

classic.$description: Classic tier color. Usage: entry-level membership styling.

silver.$description: Silver tier color. Silver membership styling.

gold.$description: Gold tier color. Usage: gold membership styling.

platinum.$description: Platinum tier color. Usage: 	platinum membership styling.

diamond.$description: Diamond tier color. Usage: diamond membership styling.

limitless.$description: Limitless tier color. Usage: top-tier membership styling.

shadow-blur.$description: More prominent shadow for higher elevation. Usage: Standard blur amount for shadows.

shadow-wide-blur.$description: Wide shadow blur. Usage: extended blur for elevated elements.

shadow-up-y.$description: Upward shadow offset. Usage: shadow above elements (negative Y value).

shadow-down-y.$description: Downward shadow offset. Usage: shadow below elements (positive Y value).

shadow-down-wide-y.$description: Shadow below elements (positive Y value). Usage: extended shadow below important elements.

backgroundBlur.$description: Standard blur amount. Usage: Default backdrop blur effect.
